name: POS Application
description: A personal portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS.
longDescription: The MERN stack POS (Point of Sale) application is a modern web-based solution built with MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. It offers a comprehensive system for managing sales transactions, inventory, and customer data. MongoDB provides a flexible database for storing product and sales information, while Express.js handles server-side logic and API requests. React delivers a dynamic and responsive user interface for seamless interaction, and Node.js powers the backend with efficient handling of concurrent requests. The application supports real-time updates, user authentication, and intuitive reporting features, making it an ideal tool for retail businesses seeking efficient and scalable point-of-sale management.
